markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)): DC 52 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 50 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 47 [Ilthuliak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2357) **Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 455 **Perception** +37; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 60 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6), [Jotun](/Languages.aspx?ID=8), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +35, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +36, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +41, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +40, [First World Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +38, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +40, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +35 **Str** +10 **Dex** +6 **Con** +7 **Int** +7 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +6 --- **AC** 47 **Fort** +38 **Ref** +35 **Will** +35 +1 status to all saves vs. magic, +4 status vs. mental **HP** 450 **Immunities** acid, paralyzed, sleep **[Frightful Presence](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=17)** ([aura](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=5), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [_fear_](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 41
**Tail Lash** **Trigger** A creature within reach of the dragon's tail takes an action to Strike or attempt a skill check **Efiect** The dragon Strikes with its tail at the triggering creature at a –2 penalty. If it hits, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the triggering roll. --- **Speed** 70 feet, fly 180 feet, swim 70 feet **Melee** jaws +39 ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d12+18 piercing plus 2d6 acid and 2d6 [persistent acid](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Melee** claw +39 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d8+18 slashing **Melee** tail +37 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 4d6+16 bludgeoning **Melee** horns +37 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d6+16 piercing **Arcane Prepared Spells** DC 44, attack +36 - **Cantrips (10th)** [Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58), [Electric Arc](/Spells.aspx?ID=97), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) - **2nd** [Glitterdust](/Spells.aspx?ID=136), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Telekinetic Maneuver](/Spells.aspx?ID=333) - **3rd** [Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Slow](/Spells.aspx?ID=289), [Stinking Cloud](/Spells.aspx?ID=309) - **4th** [Clairvoyance](/Spells.aspx?ID=40), [Resilient Sphere](/Spells.aspx?ID=255), [Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=315) - **5th** [Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Prying Eye](/Spells.aspx?ID=239) - **6th** [Dominate](/Spells.aspx?ID=87), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344), [Wall of Force](/Spells.aspx?ID=363) - **7th** [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116), [Reverse Gravity](/Spells.aspx?ID=261), [Spell Turning](/Spells.aspx?ID=297) - **8th** [Disappearance](/Spells.aspx?ID=73), [Horrid Wilting](/Spells.aspx?ID=152), [Mind Blank](/Spells.aspx?ID=192) (already cast) - **9th** [Disjunction](/Spells.aspx?ID=77), [Implosion](/Spells.aspx?ID=162), [Weird](/Spells.aspx?ID=375) - **10th** [Time Stop](/Spells.aspx?ID=339) **Arcane Innate Spells** DC 44 - **2nd** [Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will) **Breath Weapon** ([Acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) Illthuliak breathes a spray of acid that deals 22d6 acid damage in a 100-foot line (DC 44 basic Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. **Corrupt Water** ([Arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) **Frequency** Once per day; **Effect** The dragon permanently befouls 10 cubic feet of liquid within 90 feet. The liquid becomes undrinkable and unable to support water-breathing life. This destroys liquid magic or alchemical items if they're of a lower level than the dragon (a creature can attempt a DC 41 Will save to protect liquids in its possession). This doesn't affect liquids in a creature's body
name: Ilthuliak

text: Ilthuliak Recall Knowledge - Dragon (Arcana): DC 52 Unspecific Lore : DC 50 Specific Lore : DC 47 Ilthuliak Source Kingmaker Adventure Path pg. 455 Perception +37; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 60 feet Languages Aklo, Common, Draconic, Goblin, Jotun, Orcish, Sylvan Skills Acrobatics +35, Arcana +36, Athletics +41, Deception +40, First World Lore +38, Intimidation +40, Stealth +35 Str +10 Dex +6 Con +7 Int +7 Wis +6 Cha +6 --- AC 47 Fort +38 Ref +35 Will +35 +1 status to all saves vs. magic, +4 status vs. mental HP 450 Immunities acid, paralyzed, sleep Frightful Presence (aura, emotion, fear , mental) 90 feet, DC 41 Tail Lash Reaction Trigger A creature within reach of the dragon's tail takes an action to Strike or attempt a skill check Efiect The dragon Strikes with its tail at the triggering creature at a –2 penalty. If it hits, the creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to the triggering roll. --- Speed 70 feet, fly 180 feet, swim 70 feet Melee Single Action jaws +39 (Acid, Magical, reach 20 feet), Damage 4d12+18 piercing plus 2d6 acid and 2d6 persistent acid Melee Single Action claw +39 (Agile, Magical, reach 15 feet), Damage 4d8+18 slashing Melee Single Action tail +37 (Magical, reach 25 feet), Damage 4d6+16 bludgeoning Melee Single Action horns +37 (Magical, reach 20 feet), Damage 3d6+16 piercing Arcane Prepared Spells DC 44, attack +36 - Cantrips (10th) Dancing Lights, Electric Arc, Prestidigitation, Read Aura, Shield - 1st Command, Ray of Enfeeblement, True Strike - 2nd Glitterdust, Mirror Image, Telekinetic Maneuver - 3rd Blindness, Slow, Stinking Cloud - 4th Clairvoyance, Resilient Sphere, Suggestion - 5th Black Tentacles, Dimension Door, Prying Eye - 6th Dominate, True Seeing, Wall of Force - 7th Finger of Death, Reverse Gravity, Spell Turning - 8th Disappearance, Horrid Wilting, Mind Blank (already cast) - 9th Disjunction, Implosion, Weird - 10th Time Stop Arcane Innate Spells DC 44 - 2nd Darkness (at will) Breath Weapon Two Actions (Acid, Arcane, Evocation) Illthuliak breathes a spray of acid that deals 22d6 acid damage in a 100-foot line (DC 44 basic Reflex save). She can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds. Corrupt Water Single Action (Arcane, Concentrate, Necromancy) Frequency Once per day; Effect The dragon permanently befouls 10 cubic feet of liquid within 90 feet. The liquid becomes undrinkable and unable to support water-breathing life. This destroys liquid magic or alchemical items if they're of a lower level than the dragon (a creature can attempt a DC 41 Will save to protect liquids in its possession). This doesn't affect liquids in a creature's body
